  • Uses of TestInstantiationAwareExtension.ExtensionContextScope in org.junit.jupiter.api.extension

    Subclasses with type arguments of type TestInstantiationAwareExtension.ExtensionContextScope in org.junit.jupiter.api.extension
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    TestInstantiationAwareExtension.ExtensionContextScope
    ExtensionContextScope is used to define the scope of the ExtensionContext passed to an extension during the instantiation of test instances.

    Description
